item.description:
Film time is 3:30 pm. Expect a crowd, based on the last two Sundays in Manchester. Get there early to get a ticket. We are going to see the 2D version as that is a what the consensus was.

If you are interested in the 3D version, it starts at 2:45 pm.

First of three films for the The Hobbit, the first book (prequel) of The Lord of the Rings. It has finally made it here.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lobby. I'll be standing between the bar and the snack bar.
item.name: The Hobbit - J.R.R. Tolkien
